title: The Demon Duke’s Favor Begins the Second Time Around
My Body Has Been Possessed By Someone
summary: Seven years ago, Kanna was thrown into the body of a Korean girl named Joohwa. She had everything in her new life—a loving family, a great boyfriend, a hard-won medical license, even her own clinic! But that all changes when she's suddenly swapped back one day. Just as she's been in Joohwa's body, Joohwa has been in hers... and she's left Kanna's life a mess! First things first, she's going to divorce her cold husband, Duke Silvian Valentino. After that? Revenge on everyone who's wronged her.

title: Absolute Regression
summary:
The past has changed, but like a fiery comet, he still comes. 

Mugi Hwa, the one without equal, slashed through Murim's skies with his sword, toppling every lord who dared to face him – even Cheonma, Mugeuk Geom’s father. But Mugeuk didn’t accept defeat. Instead, he turned to the forbidden: a time-bending ritual that hurled him into his own past. 

Now, retracing his steps, he races against the clock until Mugi emerges once again. But this time, it's not just about power, but mending old wounds and forging new bonds to unite his people and prepare for the bloodtide to come.

title: I will try to seduce the male lead for my brother
summary:
*I'll marry the male lead myself!*

Raffine is in a predicament, and there are three reasons why. One, she's been reincarnated into a super angsty, highly depressing novel. Two, her older brother is destined for death in said novel. And three, the only way to save him is by marrying the male lead. What the hell is going on?!

---
I possessed Raphine, the youngest sister of the second male lead, who had no dreams nor hopes, in an impoverished and obsession filled novel. That was also because he had a crush on the female lead, who married the male lead on a contract, and eventually died.

I can't believe it's such a miserable ending for my favorite character and kind eldest brother. No way!

Raphine decided to brainwash Prince Jerkan, the male lead of the novel, to prevent the female lead's contract marriage.

So that he can think of me when he needs a contract marriage!

"Jerkan! I want to marry you!"
"If you're grateful, you have to marry me next time."
"I need a simple marriage, so I'll get married through a contract."

And when the brainwashing finally succeeded, Raphine cheered inside.

"Okay. Definitely, I'll marry you."

I never imagined what kind of eyes he was had. Yeah, I really didn't know then. I didn't know this would happen.

"Didn't you pester me because you wanted to marry me?"
"Will you run away?"

title: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home
summary:
Lady Solea's family can't figure out how she lost her memories or why she keeps raving about her "jackpot." They don't realize she's actually Yoon Jiyoon, a lottery winner who was suddenly brought into their world! Determined to return to her reality and claim her riches, Jiyoon sets off a series of shenanigans to send herself home. Yet when Solea's family proves more fun than expected and distracts her from the mission to leave, Jiyoon begins to wonder if family is worth more than a fortune...

---
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

title: Reincarnation Of The Heavenly Demon
summary:
In an ancient world where martial artists reign supreme, Unseong can only watch as his master is brutally beaten to death after a false accusation of practicing forbidden demonic arts. Even after a valiant fight, he fails to kill those responsible and faces his own end. But fate has other plans… Instead of taking his last breath, he awakens as a child, training to be an elite soldier of a demonic sect. Now Unseong must embrace the demonic arts and harness power in his ultimate quest for revenge.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Ap-KOIYUqw) | [JP](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8bRXNwJojI) | [CN](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrTrHgv5ndc)  | [TW](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iN_NifT0mvI)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/26650)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/chroniques-demoniaques)

title: It’s Your Fault for Being Poor: The Fallen Noble Lady Faces the Consequences of a Broken Engagement
I Can’t Wait To Eat You
summary: Outstanding talent. A look that won't be overlooked no matter where you are. A prosperous family. I lived by walking only on well-paved paths. Everything was so perfect to the point that it was boring. Then one day when I turned 30... Taejun Kim impulsively deviates from the path. To meet ‘Han So-eun’, the daughter of the driver who took his parents’ lives. 'With what kind of face did you come to this company?' The shameless face was disgusting. So he decided to stick around and torment her. Like a person who is impatient because he can't eat... “I think the director likes..."

title: I am the Precious Daughter of the Greatest Villain in the Fantasy World
summary:
I thought I had reincarnated as the daughter of a rich family, but instead I was born as the daughter of the greatest villain in a martial arts novel?! An indifferent dad and a senior brother who eventually kills me. I need to quickly learn martial arts to be able to survive…! But these two… Why do they keep doting on me?!

---
I've become a part of this Wuxia novel as Lihwa, the thoughtful and gentle daughter of Cheon Ma... who's also the ultimate villain! Known as the Demon King and ruthless leader of the Demonic Sect, he resorts to kidnapping and other nefarious deeds to make sure a boy named Ak Wuryeon never reaches his full potential. Wuryeon doesn't seem THAT bad, but I know he'll one day exact his revenge on my father and that includes me! Can I escape the clutches of my father's enemies and my doomed destiny before it’s too late?

title: Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint
summary: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.

title: Past Life Returner
summary:
In a world crawling with monsters and dungeons, Na Sunhoo and the other Awakeneds fight to protect humanity. But after he is killed in a deadly battle, a screen appears.

[Initiate Time Regression?] 

Now with a second chance at life, Sunhoo returns to the past, determined to make as much money as possible to buy the land the dungeon is on and destroy it before the monsters can appear. 

With innocent lives at risk, can Sunhoo strike it rich and vanquish the monsters once and for all?

title: Fated to Be Loved by Villains
summary:
One day, he reincarnated in the game Savior Rising as Daud Campbell, a powerless noble living on the outskirts. He decides to live quietly, avoiding others' attention.

On his first day inside the game, he gets involved with the final boss, also known as the vessel of the grey demon, Elnore Elinarize la Tristan.

After their encounter, the protagonist gains two special rewards: [Desperate Survival], which makes him stronger when his rate of survival decreases, and [Deadly Charm], which charms those who have evil traits. With the use of his skills, he calmly overcomes the challenges with his veteran expertise.

But every time he overcomes a challenge, those with evil traits become interested in him...

Finally, he received his end goal.

"Put this continent's fate on the line and charm all of them."

---

**Original Webtoon:**     
- [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/66116309)
- [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/-/4409)

**Official Translations:**     
- [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/173962)

title: For the Young Villain’s Happy Ending
summary:
[There was a pitiful girl who cried tears of diamond and lived while being abused by her family. But a prince appeared and killed off the entirety of the evil family. And so, the girl lived happily ever after with the prince.]

...is the fairy tale, but I reincarnated as the evil sister, 'Marcia Blick'?!

This damned household! I have to escape from this house now, at least! But if I run away, what about my sister who will be left behind? I've made my decision! We're going to run away together!

'Larisa. Let's go find that prince who will make you happy!'

But: "Please marry me."

Prince, why are you proposing to me? Your partner isn't me, but my sister! This sister of yours will make you a 'perfect ending plan'!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54970327), [Naver Series](http://naver.me/GLuxzytv)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%99%ED%99%94-%EC%86%8D-%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%98-%EC%99%84%EB%B2%BD%ED%95%9C-%EC%97%94%EB%94%A9-%ED%94%8C%EB%9E%9C/2867), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58925157)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-perfect-plan-for-a-fairy-tale-ending/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26297&contentId=297&platform=IA)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%8D%E6%B4%BE%E4%B9%9F%E6%83%B3%E8%A6%81%E6%9C%89%E5%AE%8C%E7%BE%8E%E7%B5%90%E5%B1%80/331)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Perfect-Plan-for-a-Fairy-Tale-Ending/571)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112309)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%93%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2/382)

title: The Young Wife
summary: I possessed the body of the distant ancestor of the male lead in a martial arts novel where he dominates everything. To faithfully fulfill my role of supporting him, I worked myself to the bone and established the greatest family. After that, I peacefully closed my eyes. "What? My family has collapsed?!" When I opened my eyes again, 300 years had passed. The family I had painstakingly built was on the brink of ruin. On top of that, the male lead I dedicated my life to cheering for was about to enter a humiliating political marriage with the villainess from the original story. But the biggest problem was... "Why did I become that villainess!"

title: My Husband Was Stolen Twice
summary: What if your whole life was predetermined? When Noelle Ainelle is reborn as an evil marchioness, she learns she is fated to die alongside her 5-year-old daughter at her husband’s hands. But with a new attitude and a will to live, Noelle resolves to salvage her marriage for their daughter’s sake. Too bad her husband, Rupert Ainelle, is a war-loving marquess who knows nothing but violence. With the clock ticking before the unthinkable, can this villainess make peace with her warmonger husband?

title: One Day My Sister Died
summary: A short Twitter manga by Hamaken wherein a brother's younger sister struggles to maintain eye contact with him, except...

title: Drug Devourer
summary:
One day, a gate suddenly opened in the heavens, bringing with it the invasion of monsters and the intervention of monks in the human world.

『Miracle Drug “Coffee” Administration』

『Medicinal Contents: Caffeine and Sugar』
☞ Provides energy
☞ Stimulates the central nervous system
☞ Maximizes senses and reflexes

The whole world appeared to slow down, and Hanyul’s medications began to show their true effects.

title: Becoming A Family With The Duke and His Dear Son
summary: After her transmigration into the body of a villainess, Ibellia Barnein made it her first goal to call off the contractual marriage that would lead to her untimely death. Try as she might to avoid the cold duke and his son, however, they appear in front of Ibellia time and time again. Can she break her role as the evil stepmother? Or are the novel's events doomed to pass despite her best efforts?

title: Incentive
summary:
Taekyung, the CEO of Sona Cosmetics, is a flawless and coldly rational boss.
Yuju, who had been harboring a one-sided love for him,
grows weary of being seen only as his chief secretary.
Unable to suppress her feelings any longer,
she submits her resignation after a year of silent longing.
But then...

“I forgot to give you your incentive.”
“What do you mean...?”
“I’ll give you what you want most.”
“Sorry?”
“Even if it means offering my body—your incentive.”

Without hesitation, he places his hand over her white blouse.

“But before we do this, let me make one thing clear. If you pull away again afterward, I won’t hold back next time.”

A secret temptation approaches her just as she tries to quit—<Incentive>.

title: The Demon Lord Hates Reverse Harem
Regressor Instruction Manual
summary:
[Will you join the game?]

Giyoung's suddenly thrown into a game of life and death. Not only that, but he's also the player with the lowest stats. Still, he's got one skill on his side: the ability to read other players' status!

He finds the opportunity of his life when he discovers that Hyunsung is a returner to this world.

Now all Giyoung has to do is stick next to Hyunsung and game his way out of this tutorial.

title: I Adopted a Villainous Dad
summary:
One day I woke up and I was six years old. I had transmigrated into the main character of a tragic novel, Saint Priscilla, who walks through all sorts of thorny paths! Since I’m here, I need to avoid the scheduled special misfortune and live happily with my favorite character. The final boss of the story and the villain, Melchizedek, the tyrant of the Rehel Empire, who has no blood or tears! A happy life of adopting my father and becoming a princess, with my favorite character. I also saved the male protagonist, in order to remove my father’s death flag.

“If you approach my daughter, you will die.”

Why does my father keep putting up death flags?

Moreover… “If you tamed me, you have to take responsibility.”

Why is the male lead so obsessed with me? What’s going on?

---
One day, a girl awakens as 6-year-old St. Priscilla, the heroine of her most cherished novel. The catch? She is destined to suffer with an abusive adoptive family! To avoid this, she adopts her ultimate bias, the ruthless Emperor Melkiades, as her father instead. Although spending her days fangirling and redeeming her bias's tarnished name seems like a dream come true, with so many foes still lurking in the shadows, can this young saint protect Melkiades and find happiness for them both?

title: Honestly, This 13th Regression Is Getting Tough
Gorgeous Robe
summary: Zheng Heyue is an illegitimate child who must remain unseen. She had lived a peaceful life with her mother when she was young. But everything changed on her 10th birthday when explosion took away all of her loved ones. But it wasn't an accident, it was murder! Determined to avenge her family, she hid her identity and adopts the name Jiang Qiutian, enduring many years of hardship. After many years, she finally steps into the mansion where her mother's killer resides, and her long-awaited revenge is about to begin

title: My School Life Pretending To Be a Worthless Person
summary:
The world discovered the essence of the human soul, Ideia, and found a way to materialize it. The stronger one's Ideia, the more power one has.

In a society where hierarchy is determined by this power, F-Rank Park Jinsung has always been his school's punching bag. In reality, though, he is an S-Rank with extreme bloodlust, which he has been hiding to keep others safe.

With only two years left of high school, will Jinsung be able to hide his killer side and prove rank isn't everything?

---
- [Webtoon Teaser](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RNHjCpXtHpI)

title: Absolute Sword Sense
summary:
For as long as he can remember, Woonhwi So has been the black sheep of his family and clan. Because his spirit core has been destroyed, he has no choice but to serve as a third-rate spy for the Blood Cult.

One day, during his mission to find the legendary Blade Scroll, he is killed and sent 10 years into the past. When Woonhwi regains consciousness, he realizes that he has been sent back to the day he was kidnapped by the Blood Cult, and that he has gained a mysterious ability to hear the voice of a dagger.

title: Unshakable Female Lead in Regret Genre
Darling, Why Do You Regret It?
summary:
I secretly met my husband's mistress. Delicate, lovely, and sweet, her name was Saira.

“I’ll never leave the Duke!”

“Now, *that’s* the spirit.”

“W-what?”

I had reincarnated as Tareia—a noblewoman with a wealthy family, beauty, and nothing to feel inferior about in life. But there was just one obstacle in my perfect plan: “Keep seducing my husband.”

I was ready to toss him aside and live a fabulous single life. 

...Or so I thought.

“I’m starting to find you fascinating.”

“Can I call you... 'Lea'?”

“My lady, please, anything but divorce.”

Why are these men suddenly acting like this?!

---
Watching on helplessly as her beloved husband carried on a whirlwind affair with a beautiful commoner, then dying tragically only to be replaced right away by that same mistress, Duchess DeLov was a pitiful figure... in the book I didn't even bother finishing! Okay, well, I'm not going to live that way. Step one: Ruin his reputation. Step two: Secure a divorce. Step three: Enjoy my happy, rich, single life! ...Step four: Fake a relationship with a handsome stranger to shake off our stalkers.

---
Tareya DeLov awakens in a novel to find herself married to the cold and aloof Duke Anteros Mel DeLov, who's cheating on her with a mistress! Appalled, she immediately petitions for divorce, hoping to keep her share of wealth and win the public's sympathy. But as the divorce comes closer to being approved, Anteros won't leave Tareya alone, remorseful and relentlessly begging her to reconsider. Will Tareya succeed in separating from her husband? And what's with Anteros' sudden shift in attitude?

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: Cheating Men Must Die
summary:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."

title: Taram Taram Taram
summary:
“Dawn” entered the hall with her calm movements and stood in the middle. Her face showed no emotions, like a doll, but she was captivating and elegant, strikingly like an ice queen. Exer smiled lightly, spread her legs, and said, ‘As Lord, I will embrace you tonight.’ A fateful encounter for the first time. A woman falls in love at first sight. And a man fights the world for this woman. ‘If this world cannot accept her as a wife, then I will change this world.’ A love story between Dawn, the Eastern girl who endured a tough childhood while fleeing from war and became a slave, and Exer, the handsome man who was known as the strongest warrior in the kingdom.

---
Arrogant Duke Ixor Malkuth is used to getting absolutely everything he wants... until he meets the beautiful Daon, a slave who refuses to give in to his demands. As the conquerer of Daon's territory, Ixor tries to treat her like his mistress, but when she runs away, he decides to charm her into loving him. Yet with every attempt to seduce her, Ixor finds himself slowly falling for her instead. Will the prideful duke succeed in stealing Daon's affection, or will he find his own heart conquered?

title: The Monster Knight wants Parental Leave
summary: Lucia is the captain of the imperial knights and a swordmaster famous for her extraordinary achievements. However, she regrets something on her deathbed: unknowingly aiding a nefarious group in their plot to sacrifice the saintess for profit. So when she wakes up in the past as her 25-year-old self, Lucia is determined to rescue the child saintess and keep her safe until she’s old enough to protect herself. But the formidable knight is completely clueless when it comes to raising a child... Will six months of maternity leave be enough time for her to figure things out?

title: The Fake Bride Can’t Escape
summary:
A pushy romantic comedy about a god who has been sleeping for 200 years and a positive JK!

Yui, a JK who has been able to see ghosts since she was a child, has an unrequited love on a god whom she has never met but who is loved by all ghosts. She spends her time dreaming of meeting him someday, but then the god, who has been asleep for 200 years after his fiancée ran away from him, finally wakes up.

Yui immediately proposes to the god, but...?

title: Return of the Apocalypse-Class Death Knight
summary:
Damien Haksen was once a gifted warrior with a bright future, but everything changed when a powerful Archlich twisted him into a Death Knight. Controlled by dark magic, he murdered his own family and helped destroy a kingdom. He broke free at the very end — too late to undo the damage. 

But fate gave him one more chance.

Now back in the past, Damien is determined to protect the people he once lost and destroy the dark mages who turned his life into a nightmare. This time, he’ll fight not for glory, but for love, redemption, and the future of his family.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: It’s Annoying Because My Childhood Friend Is An Archmage
summary: A cynical noblewoman cursed to hear others' thoughts struggles to control her childhood friend—a wildly powerful mage whose flirting is as explosive as his unchecked magic. His outrageous marriage proposals ("I'll conquer the empire for you!") and her exasperated damage control create a hilarious magical rom-com where keeping him sane might just drive her mad first.

title: Baby Princess Through the Status Window
summary:
Princess Chervianne Aerveldote has lived a lonely life, and now she's being put to death for a crime she didn't commit. However, her execution turns out to be a fresh start when she wakes up as her 5-year-old self with an ability to read people's thoughts with status windows. Chervianne quickly learns how badly she misjudged everyone in the past, finding affection and betrayal in unexpected places. But will her newfound insight be enough to change her story and finally find love in her life?

---
I was condemned as a cruel villain and sentenced to death. But somehow, I was transported back to the past when I was a five-year-old child. The moment I faced my father, who looked much younger now, a strange blue window appeared before my eyes — it was a pale blue window that revealed another’s inner self.

[Alderuan Erveldote]
Role: Emperor (Lv.99)
Favorability: 90,980,984
Mood: Dear daughter I miss you

…But Father...? I assume it’s Dad's feelings but… What the Hell is going on?

[Damian Erveldote]
Mood: Glad to see my sister
Thoughts: I want to talk to you T ^ T

[Ellie]
Mood: Holding back from breaking the wall because it’s too cute
Thoughts: I’ll definitely make a commemorative collection titled “The Daily Life of a Cute Princess!”

[Karmen Kasselov]
Mood: Excited
Thoughts: Why is it that every time I see you, you are one step more beautiful? What do they feed you at my palace? Do they have a magic potion that can make everyone this beautiful?

I used to think that everyone held a grudge against me, but seeing how they treat me like that I guess that’s not true?! If what the status window tells me is true then maybe I can live a better life in this lifetime!

---

title: Dungeon Architect
summary:
Kang Chiwoo lost his life in an accident and got reincarnated as the son of a great demon lord in another world.

Unlike his previous life as a map designer, he is now a loser named Kella.

However, in a world where magic exists and having realized the dormant power of Kella, Chiwoo sets out to achieve his goal of creating his dream map that he couldn't make in his past life...

Will Kella be able to create his own map while fending off his brothers who constantly try to kill him, the countless threats upon his life, and the pressure of those around him who want him to succeed the throne?

title: The man I had a one-night stand with turned out to be my fiancé
The Male Lead Is Obsessed With Proposing to Me
summary:
Trapped in a story where the male lead must love her to survive, a woman dedicates eight years to manipulating his heart — silent stalking, strategic appearances, engineered coincidences. 

But when her coldly planned "happy ending" arrives, she learns a hard lesson: you can't control love without losing yourself.

title: When a K-Eldest Daughter Possesses a Childcare Novel
Ava the despised princess finds love and freedom
summary: Women are nothing more than tools for giving birth to children! Ava, the princess of the Lorraine Empire, where discrimination against women is rampant, is considered a "worthless princess" and treated worse than a servant because she is a woman. While being whipped by her brother, Prince Aaron, the shock of the whipping brings back memories of her previous life, when she was overworked and killed by her superiors and brother. If things continue they are, she may die just like in her previous life -to protect herself, to gain her freedom, Ava resolves to defeat her brother and become the first female emperor.The scorned princess's survival in the imperial palace begins now!

title: The Reason Why That Villainess Picked Up A Sword
summary:
Erin suffered her entire life from the abuse of the Marchioness and the malicious rumors she spread, until she finally died.

After two reincarnations, she returned as a genius Sword Master.

This time, everything will be different.

---
"Your Majesty wants you to hear this. Your family will soon follow you."

Murdered after years of abuse and false accusations from her stepmother. Thought it was over, after two reincarnations, she returned to her original self, Erin Rexus, known as the greatest villainess. Before losing everything and even losing her loved ones.

"I know there are things you can't tell me. When you're ready, tell me."

The kind and compassionate Second Prince, Ferdin Rexus. When she returned to the past and faced him again, she vowed to herself. She would save him. Even if it meant becoming a true villainess.

title: Misfortune at Work
summary: “A love life? Give me a break.” A complete non-believer when it comes to romance, Eunho is focused on climbing the ladder at work. Smart with excellent social skills to boot, both her bosses and clients love her. But when a new hire suddenly appears in front of her and an old first love start to shake things up again, she can’t help but waver.

title: Mistaken for a Wicked Woman!
summary:
“Don’t you think it’s stupid to be crazy in love?”

Queen Laetitia was executed on the scaffold. For she had done evil things to make his lover turn her infatuated husband. However, she thought she was dead, but for some reason, she had returned back in time and her second life began.

“I won’t fall in love in this life. I’m going to live a peaceful life by becoming a sober student with glasses!”

I will be taken. After that, for some reason, Camillus' raging love affair began…?!

I’ll somehow survive with these glasses…!!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0744gz/)

**Original Web Publication:** [Comic Days](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361054105850), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62861), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8591)

title: High class
summary: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!

title: My Master Doesn’t Bite People
summary:
"Am I going to die just trying to buy my own house?!"

Luci, a maid lured in by a high salary, ends up at a remote mansion. Her employer? Ska, a half-dragon with a notorious reputation for being insane.

"The salary must include hazard pay for putting up with his temper, right? That's a fair deal!"

Smashing up the house on a whim? Kicking her out just because he hates her hair color?—As long as she thinks of it all as part of the service fee, she can endure it!

But wait... when she looks closely, her master turns out to be kind of… cute? Huh? The way he looks at her is starting to change...? No way—! My master hates humans!

title: Red Shirt
summary: The legend of the killer company, Cha Si-hyuk. He decides to retire after meeting the woman he loves, but the company has no intention of letting him go easily. Eventually, everything starts to be taken away from him, and Cha Si-hyuk takes up the sword again. Revenge begins, and the war with the huge organization ‘Neville’ becomes unavoidable… What will be left at the end of the sword of revenge?
